author: Michael N
description: It takes a single malt to properly live up to the big flavours of the whisky liqueur. The only question is how much lemon juice and additional sugar suit your taste?
name: Rusty Sour
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass
